author: pipermerriam
content: Here's the proposed scheme for the unified verkle trie: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/proposed-verkle-tree-scheme-for-ethereum-state/5805

author: pipermerriam
content:
I *think* that with this updated schema we'll be well positioned for upgrading the state network such that:

- State access becomes an O(1) operation
- More efficient storage layout with nodes in the network storing a contiguous "chunk" of the state trie
- **MAYBE** the network might be able to support "sync" as a supported use case.
